level.heading: Audible notification of expiration of useful life.
level.text: * ยง 28-312.2 Audible notification of expiration of useful life. All carbon monoxide alarms installed after the effective date of this article shall comply with UL 2034 and be of a type that emits an audible notification at the expiration of the useful life of such alarm. * NB Effective until April 1, 2014 * ยง 28-312.2. Periodic replacement of carbon monoxide alarms. Carbon monoxide alarms required pursuant to section 908.7 of the New York city building code or sections 27-981.1, 27-981.2 and 27-981.3 of the 1968 building code shall be replaced when the time elapsed since the installation of such alarm exceeds the manufacturer's suggested useful life of the alarm. Exception: A carbon monoxide alarm installed prior to the effective date of this article shall be replaced when the time elapsed since the installation of such alarm exceeds the manufacturer's suggested useful life of the alarm or within 6 months after the effective date of this article, whichever is later. * NB Effective April 1, 2014
